PageTitle: display mpls te cspf tedb interface
FuncDef: The display mpls te cspf tedb interface command displays CSPF-based SID information that meets the specified conditions.
CLIs: display mpls te cspf tedb interface <ip-address>
display mpls te cspf tedb interface <ip-address> igp-type isis
display mpls te cspf tedb interface <ip-address> igp-type ospf

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the destination IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te cspf tedb interface 192.168.1.1
OSPF Router ID:  192.168.1.1      Opaque LSA ID:  1.0.0.1
Link Type:  point-to-point   Link Status:  Active
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls te cspf tedb interface command displays CSPF-based SID information that meets the specified conditions on the main control board.
